downloadTitle: Active Directory Rights Management Services Mobile Device Extension
downloadDescription: Add-in for Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 2016 and Windows 2019  AD RMS to enable support for RMS-enabled cross platform applications
detailsSection: This add-in can be installed on AD RMS nodes running on Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 2016, and WIndows 2019 to extend RMS support to cross platform applications using the Microsoft Information Protection SDK, or  Rights Management Services SDK 4.0 . Applications such as the Azure information Protection Unified Client, AIP Viewer on iOS and Android, Office Pro Plus  native integration on Mac, iOS, and Android, and partner integrations in DLP, CASB, PDF readers among others.
systemRequirementsSection:
• AD RMS running on Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows server 2016 , or Windows Server 2019
  • AD FS 3.0
installInstructionSection:
Before installing the Mobile Device Extension on your AD RMS servers you MUST install and configure the pre-requisites as per https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/information-protection/develop/how-to-install-and-configure-an-rms-server

Once your pre-requisites are configured you can download and install this add-on on all your AD RMS nodes.
